name: Cosmo Defense
description:
A space themed tower defense mobile game (android) made especially for those who hate the obligation to deploy their troops in predefined places.

Gameplay

Defend the planets with your various types of space troops. Earn points to unlock new troops.
The game features:

- 25 phases;
- 20 different enemies;
- Several different troops, enabling different strategies;
- Power Ups;
- Compatibility with Google Play Games.

1 - Click on a empty space.

2 - Click on a troop.

3 - Click on the "Escolher" button.

4 - You now have a troop selected. Select other troops according to the available spaces. After that, click on the "Iniciar" button.

5 - To place your troop to attack, select it by clicking on the button corresponding to it.

6 - Click anywhere on the screen to place your troop.

7 - Enjoy! Can you beat all 25 levels?
